text: Larry Pine (born March 3, 1945) is an American actor. In television, he starred in As the World Turns, One Life to Live, All My Children, Hostages, and House of Cards, and roles in movies include Alone in the Dark, Plain Clothes, Vanya on 42nd Street, Dead Man Walking, Before and After, The Royal Tenenbaums, Maid in Manhattan, Melinda and Melinda, Killing Kasztner, Moonrise Kingdom, Jimmy P: Psychotherapy of a Plains Indian, and The Grand Budapest Hotel. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Tucson, Arizona
title: Larry Pine
